title: The Last bastion
creator_credit: Brian Rosen, Network Ten (Australia) and Chris Thomson
brief_description: Set in Australia in 1942 and concerning the threat of Japanese invasion, this is a drama about the characters and events of the time in Australian history in which the inner cabinet of Australia’s coalition war government played a major role. The distinguished cast includes Timothy West, Robert Vaughn, John Wood, Michael Blakemore, Warren Mitchell and Ray Barrett. David Williamson co-wrote the script.
